name: ᴜɴᴋɴᴏᴡɴ ʟᴀɴᴅꜱ (ᴀʟᴩʜᴀ ʀᴇʟᴇᴀꜱᴇ)
description:
A man stranded in the middle of nowhere, discovers a pyramid to his astonishment. He had no idea that the pyramid was unique and that it was a no mans land. As he delves deeper into the riddle, he discovers that he is mysteriously linked to the pyramid's past.

Unfold the mystery of the pyramid in this Oculus Quest 2 action-adventure VR game.

Note: This is an alpha release and the final product will be drastically different.
